title: Resume
text:
Data Analytics Leader in Social Science Research
San Francisco, California, United States



Email: your.email@example.com
LinkedIn: Christopher Praley
GitHub: Your GitHub Profile




Experienced researcher with a demonstrated history of working across local, state, and federal governments in addition to the world’s top tech companies. Skilled in quantitative analysis, qualitative analysis, and policy analysis. Strong business development professional with a Bachelor of Arts (B.A.) focused in Public Policy Studies.





New York University · Part-time

San Francisco Bay Area

San Francisco, California, United States
- Lead planning and execution of People Analytics function at Thumbtack.



Thumbtack

San Francisco, California, United States



Facebook

San Francisco Bay Area
- Supported several Facebook products to analyze user experience at scale.



Peace Corps

Washington D.C. Metro Area



Peace Corps

Washington, District Of Columbia



Peace Corps
Aug 2016 - Oct 2017 · 1 yr 3 mos
Washington, District Of Columbia
- Co-managed the agency’s largest evaluation project, the Country Portfolio Review.






Bachelor of Arts (B.A.), Public Policy Studies
2011 - 2015
- Dean’s List 2012-2015 - Graduated with Special Honors in Public Policy Studies and General Honors in the College



Applied Statistics in Social Science Research
Sep 2023






CITI Program
Issued Nov 2023 · Expires Nov 2026
Credential ID 59450583





Research: 8 endorsements
Public Policy: 3 endorsements
Programming Languages: Python, R, JavaScript
Tools: Git, Docker, AWS






Apr 1, 2015
Senior thesis evaluating Peace Corps’ response to the Ebola outbreak, focusing on the summer evacuation’s impact on Peace Corps Volunteers.





Spanish






December 13, 2022
Chris was an excellent analyst and leader. We actively worked together to track employee satisfaction, performance and engagement with my team. As the leader of 300 people, it’s very hard to stay on top of how my team is doing, and Chris was a key part in helping me do so. His data was thorough and his assessment was always spot on! Chris is an excellent analyst to have supporting you!
